displayName.english: Ordinary mushroom-picking girl wouldn't dream of a loli King of Hell
displayName.japanese: 普通キノコ狩り少女はロリ閻魔王の夢を見ない
displayName.schinese: 普通采蘑菇少女不会梦到萝莉阎王

description.english: Waking up from a dream of being found guilty.
description.japanese: 有罪判決の夢から目覚める。
description.schinese: 从被判有罪的梦中醒来

displayName.english: Dear Alice, the Stewed Heroine
displayName.japanese: 前略、煮込み勇者アリスよ
displayName.schinese: 前略，炖之勇者爱丽丝哟

description.english: Missed Alice's party.
description.japanese: アリスのパーティーをミスした。
description.schinese: 错过爱丽丝的派对

displayName.english: No escape! No escape! No escape!
displayName.japanese: 逃げるな！逃げるな！逃げるな！
displayName.schinese: 不能逃避！不能逃避！不能逃避！

description.english: Becoming the first defendant of the Gensokyo People's Court.
description.japanese: 幻想郷人民法院の被告初号機になる。
description.schinese: 成为幻想乡人民法院被告初号机

displayName.english: I don't believe she can roll me over the keyboardajeoifioah...
displayName.japanese: 彼女が私をキーボードに押して転がすことができるとは信じなｄｓｆはｄｓｊけｇｓ
displayName.schinese: 我就不信她能把我按在键盘上滚来滚去ajeoifioah

description.english: Teasing the prosecutor in private.
description.japanese: 検察官を内々にからかう。
description.schinese: 在私下里调侃检察官大人

displayName.english: The way to cultivate a new lawyer
displayName.japanese: 新人弁護士の育てかた

description.english: Becoming your own defense attorney.
description.japanese: 自分の弁護人になる。
description.schinese: 成为自己的辩护律师

displayName.english: Simple and easy-to-understand modern court trial
displayName.japanese: よくわかる現代裁判

description.english: Completing the trial guide for beginners.
description.japanese: 初心者向けの裁判ガイドを完成させる。
description.schinese: 完成庭审新手引导

displayName.english: Does Miss Patchouli want me to say hello?
displayName.japanese: パチュリー様は挨拶をされたい
displayName.schinese: 帕秋莉小姐想让我打招呼？

description.english: Flirting openly in court.
description.japanese: 法廷で公然と愛想をつかむ。
description.schinese: 在法庭上公然打情骂俏

displayName.english: Presumption of innocence
displayName.japanese: 無罪推定

description.english: Don't fall into the trap of self-evidence.
description.japanese: 自己証明の罠には落ちない。
description.schinese: 不要陷入自证陷阱

displayName.english: In short, I'm very nervous.
displayName.japanese: とにかく緊張する

description.english: Witnessing Hong Meirin's embarrassing appearance.
description.japanese: 紅美鈴の恥ずかしい登場を目撃する。
description.schinese: 见证红美铃出场即出糗

displayName.english: Rules are made to be broken!
displayName.japanese: ルールは破られるためにある

description.english: Discovering Chinese martial arts in a deduction game.
description.japanese: 推理ゲームで中国の武術を発見する。
description.schinese: 在推理游戏中发现中华武术

displayName.english: Everyone has their own weakness
displayName.japanese: 皆には自分の弱さがある。
displayName.schinese: 每个人都有自己的软肋

description.english: Threatening the prosecutor through family members.
description.japanese: 家族を通じて検察官を脅す。
description.schinese: 通过家属威胁检察官

displayName.english: Gap Flight
displayName.japanese: 隙間飛行

description.english: Teleporting to the crime scene through gaps.
description.japanese: 隙間を通じて現場にテレポートする。
description.schinese: 通过隙间传送到案发现场

displayName.english: Tenjin Elementary School Library?
displayName.japanese: 天神小学校図書館？

description.english: Investigating the library's windows.
description.japanese: 図書館の窓を調査する。
description.schinese: 调查图书馆的窗户

displayName.english: The Tale of Two Cats
displayName.japanese: 二匹の猫物語

description.english: Simultaneously interrogating two witnesses... cats?
description.japanese: 同時に二匹の証人…猫を尋問する？
description.schinese: 同时审问两只证人……猫？

displayName.english: Do you guys not have any moblie phones?
displayName.japanese: 携帯電話を持っていないのですか？

description.english: Obtaining a testimony of not knowing the time because there was no watch.
description.japanese: 時計を忘れていて時間を知らないという証言を得る。
description.schinese: 获得因为没带手表所以不知道时间的证词

displayName.english: Victory or defeat is a common thing for soldiers, hero, please try again
displayName.japanese: 勝敗は兵の常套で、勇者よ、再び挑戦してください。
displayName.schinese: 胜败乃兵家常事，大侠请重新来过。

description.english: Choosing the wrong suspect in the first chapter.
description.japanese: 第一章の容疑者選択で誤った選択をする。
description.schinese: 在第一章嫌犯选择时选择错误

displayName.english: It's all nonsense!
displayName.japanese: それが違う！

description.english: Passing the first chapter's puzzle level.
description.japanese: 第一章のパズルステージを突破する。
description.schinese: 通过第一章的拼图关卡

displayName.english: Azure... Court?
displayName.japanese: アズール…法廷？

description.english: Conducting a joint operation in court.
description.japanese: 法廷で共同作戦を行う。
description.schinese: 在法庭上进行联合作战

displayName.english: Court X Family?
displayName.japanese: Court X Family

description.english: Learning that Yakumo Yukari and Shikyo Youmu are colluding to act.
description.japanese: 八雲紫と四季映姫が共謀して芝居をしていることを知ります。
description.schinese: 得知八云紫和四季映姬串通演戏

displayName.english: Re:Life as a lawyer from zero
displayName.japanese: ゼロから始める弁護士生活

description.english: Obtaining the lawyer's badge.
description.japanese: 弁護士のバッジを手に入れます。
description.schinese: 获得律师徽章

displayName.english: Today is a good day
displayName.japanese: 今日はいい日ね

description.english: Bragging when asked what day it is today.
description.japanese: 今日が何の日か聞かれた時に強がります。
description.schinese: 在被问及今天是什么日子时逞强

displayName.english: Curiosity attracts cats
displayName.japanese: 好奇心が猫を引き寄せる

description.english: Welcoming Kaenbyou Rin in the law firm.
description.japanese: 法律事務所で火焔猫燐に出迎えします。
description.schinese: 在律师事务所里迎接火焰猫燐

displayName.english: We choose to defend, not because it's easy, but because it's difficult.
displayName.japanese: 私たちは弁護を選ぶのは、それが簡単なからではなく、難しいから。
displayName.schinese: 我们选择辩护，不是因为那很简单，而是因为那很困难

description.english: Taking on a defense commission against Komeiji Satori.
description.japanese: 古明地さとりを相手に弁護の依頼を受けます。
description.schinese: 接下以古明地觉为对手的辩护委托

displayName.english: Math wizard Marisa
displayName.japanese: 数学の達人魔理沙

description.english: When pushed, one can do anything except math problems.
description.japanese: 人を追い詰めると何でもできるが、数学の問題は除く。
description.schinese: 把人逼急了什么都做得出来，数学题除外

displayName.english: Do you like the plaintiff who self-reveals and reads minds in ordinary attacks?
displayName.japanese: 通常攻撃が自爆で心を読む原告が好きですか？
displayName.schinese: 普攻是自曝还带读心的原告你喜欢吗

description.english: Encountering Komeiji Satori's self-revelation during the trial.
description.japanese: 裁判中に古明地さとりの自白に遭遇する。
description.schinese: 在庭审时遭遇古明地觉的自曝

displayName.english: The evidence I want to present is... the lawyer's badge!
displayName.japanese: 私が提示する証拠は……弁護士のバッジ！
displayName.schinese: 我要出示的证物是……律师徽章！

description.english: Successfully presenting the lawyer's badge during the trial.
description.japanese: 裁判中に弁護士バッジを成功裏に提示する。
description.schinese: 成功在庭审时出示律师徽章

displayName.english: Looking for evidence in a diary, is something wrong?
displayName.japanese: 日記で証拠を求めるのは間違っているだろうか？
displayName.schinese: 在日记里寻找证据是否搞错了什么？

description.english: Analyzing the diary of Kaenbyou Rin.
description.japanese: 火焔猫燐の日記を分析する。
description.schinese: 分析火焰猫燐的日记

displayName.english: You are not prepared!
displayName.japanese: まだ準備できない！

description.english: Losing the lawsuit because you are not prepared.
description.japanese: 準備不足で敗訴する。
description.schinese: 因为没准备好而败诉

displayName.english: Do not lick the cat's face, you will be scratched.
displayName.japanese: 猫の顔に舐めないで、爪を立てられます
displayName.schinese: 不要去舔猫的脸，会被挠的

description.english: Smelling a lie without tasting the sweat of Kaenbyou Rin
description.japanese: 火焔猫燐の汗を味わわずに、嘘の匂いを感じた。
description.schinese: 在没有品尝火焰猫燐汗水的情况下嗅到了谎言的味道

displayName.english: Reincarnated as a delinquent girl, and then...
displayName.japanese: 転生して不良少女に、そして…

description.english: Trying to play a delinquent girl to threaten the Flame Cat Rin into telling the truth.
description.japanese: 真相を語るために火焔猫燐に脅迫する不良少女を演じる。
description.schinese: 尝试扮演不良少女威胁火焰猫燐说出真相

displayName.english: When will the fierce general's edition come out?
displayName.japanese: いつ「猛将伝」が出るのですか？

description.english: Getting Kaenbyou Rin's memory notes-Power Up Edition.
description.japanese: 火焔猫燐の思い出ノート・パワーアップバージョンを得る。
description.schinese: 得到火焰猫燐的回忆笔记·威力加强版

displayName.english: You are still not prepared!
displayName.japanese: まだまだ準備できない！

description.english: Still losing the lawsuit because you are not prepared.
description.japanese: 依然として準備不足で敗訴する。
description.schinese: 依然因为没准备好而败诉

displayName.english: The Lawyer Is Overpowered but Overly Cautious
displayName.japanese: この弁護士が俺TUEEEくせに慎重すぎる
displayName.schinese: 这个律师明明超强却过分谨慎

description.english: Choosing to continue preparing twice in a row.
description.japanese: 準備を続ける選択を二度繰り返す。
description.schinese: 连续两次选择继续进行准备

displayName.english: GENSOKYO OF THE DEAD
displayName.japanese: GENSOKYO OF THE DEAD

description.english: Listening to the reason why Kaenbyou Rin hunts Miyako Yoshika.
description.japanese: 火焔猫燐が宮古芳香を狩る理由を聞く。
description.schinese: 听取火焰猫燐狩猎宫古芳香的理由

displayName.english: Want to borrow the cat's hand
displayName.japanese: 猫の手まで借りたい

description.english: Suddenly grabbing the hand of Kaenbyou Rin.
description.japanese: 突然炎の猫燐の手を掴む。
description.schinese: 突然抓住火焰猫燐的手

displayName.english: The charm of statistics
displayName.japanese: 統計学の魅力的な瞬間

description.english: Learning the flexible use of statistics from Komeiji Satori.
description.japanese: 古明地さとりから統計学の柔軟な使い方を学ぶ。
description.schinese: 从古明地觉那里了解到统计学的灵活用法

displayName.english: There is not much time left for the defense
displayName.japanese: 弁護側に残された時間はあまりない
displayName.schinese: 留给辩护方的时间不多了

description.english: Striving for the last 5 minutes of thinking time in the trial.
description.japanese: 裁判で最後の5分間の思考時間を稼ぐ。
description.schinese: 在庭审中争取到最后5分钟思考时间

displayName.english: The World! Stop it, time!
displayName.japanese: 「ザ·ワールド！」止まれ、時間！

description.english: Completing the puzzle reasoning of the second chapter within 5 minutes.
description.japanese: 5分以内に第二章のパズル推理を完成させる。
description.schinese: 在5分钟之内完成第二章的拼图推理

displayName.english: Is the Red Devil Mansion on fire again?
displayName.japanese: 紅魔館はまた火事になったか？

description.english: Imagining the Red Devil Mansion on fire.
description.japanese: 紅魔館が火事になることを想像する。
description.schinese: 设想红魔馆失火

displayName.english: All or nothing.
displayName.japanese: All or nothing.

description.english: Winning the gamble where Yakumo Yukari dares to bet the court.
description.japanese: 八雲紫が裁判を賭けに使う勇気があるかどうかの賭博で勝つ。
description.schinese: 在八云紫敢不敢把法庭压上赌桌的豪赌中获胜

displayName.english: We still don't know what Marisa reasoned that day
displayName.japanese: あの日魔理沙の推理を僕達はまだ知らない
displayName.schinese: 我们仍未知道那天魔理沙推理的内容

description.english: Losing the lawsuit because of respecting the client's request.
description.japanese: クライアントの要望を尊重するため敗訴する。
description.schinese: 因为选择尊重委托人的请求而败诉

displayName.english: The road we never thought of
displayName.japanese: 思いも寄らない道

description.english: Trying to make Komeiji Satori withdraw the lawsuit.
description.japanese: 古明地覚に撤訴を試みる。
description.schinese: 试图让古明地觉撤诉

displayName.english: Do I still have evidence?
displayName.japanese: まだ証拠があるの？

description.english: Announcing that I still have evidence at the most desperate moment.
description.japanese: 最も絶望的な瞬間に「まだ証拠がある」と宣言する。
description.schinese: 在最绝望的时刻宣布，我还有证据

displayName.english: Weather controller, I used the weather controller!
displayName.japanese: 天気コントローラー！天気コントローラーを使った！
displayName.schinese: 天气控制器，我使用了天气控制器！

description.english: Really summoning snow in spring.
description.japanese: 真に春季に雪を降らせる。
description.schinese: 真的在春季召唤出了降雪

displayName.english: The charm of journalism.
displayName.japanese: ニュース学の魅力的な瞬間

description.english: Witnessing Aya News defeating the Gensokyo People's Court.
description.japanese: 文文新聞が幻想郷人民法院を打ち破るのを目撃する。
description.schinese: 见证文文新闻打败幻想乡人民法院

displayName.english: The broken fourth wall
displayName.japanese: ボロボロの第四の壁

description.english: Breaking the fourth wall in the plot.
description.japanese: ドラマで第四壁を打ち破る。
description.schinese: 在剧情中击碎第四面墙

displayName.english: Next, please welcome the main culprit of the divine disappearance, the boundary of fantasy, the demon of the boundary, the master of the Shikigami Yakumo Ran, the ruler of a thousand years, the master of the gaps, the mastermind behind the Hakurei Shrine, the dignified chief prosecutor, the expert of the boundary, Lady Yakumo Yukari!
displayName.japanese: 続いて、神隠しの首謀者、幻想の境界、境界の妖怪、式神八雲藍の主人、千年の支配者、隙間の主宰、博麗神社の黒幕、威厳の大検察官、結界の専門家、八雲紫様を歓待しましょう！
displayName.schinese: 接下来，有请神隐的主犯、幻想的境界、境界的妖怪、式神八云蓝的主人、千年的支配者、隙间的主宰、博丽神社的幕后主脑、威严的大检查官、结界的专家、八云紫女士！

description.english: Come on! The Hakugyokurou can't fit so many people, right? ！
description.japanese: 白玉楼にこんなに多くの人を収めるのは無理だろうよ！ねえ！
description.schinese: 白玉楼装不下这么多人吧喂！

displayName.english: Today is the defeat of the academic school
displayName.japanese: 今日の勝負は、学院派の敗北
displayName.schinese: 今日的胜负，是学院派的败北

description.english: Obtaining useless information through footprint analysis.
description.japanese: 足跡分析法で無駄な情報を得る。
description.schinese: 通过足迹分析之法获得了无用的信息

displayName.english: Textbook questioning.
displayName.japanese: 教科書のような疑問

description.english: Continuously questioning the inference of Hakurei Reimu.
description.japanese: 博麗霊夢の推測を次々に疑問にする。
description.schinese: 连续质疑博丽灵梦的推断

displayName.english: It's impossible to work part-time.
displayName.japanese: アルバイトは不可能です

description.english: Being forced to work overtime by Yakumo Yukari.
description.japanese: 八雲紫に残業を強制される。
description.schinese: 被八云紫强迫加班

displayName.english: It's all about solving cases in the mind
displayName.japanese: あなた、事件のことばかりですのね

description.english: Understanding Marisa's dream
description.japanese: 魔理沙の夢を理解する。
description.schinese: 了解魔理沙的梦境

displayName.english: Not feeling sad for Youmu's arrest for a moment, and then...
displayName.japanese: 妖夢の逮捕に一秒でも悲しむことなく、次に…
displayName.schinese: 一刻也没有为妖梦的被捕感到悲伤，接下来……

description.english: Starting the on-site investigation immediately after Youmu's arrest.
description.japanese: 妖夢が逮捕された後すぐに現場調査を開始する。
description.schinese: 在妖梦被捕后立刻开始现场调查

displayName.english: Today is the academic school's defeat again
displayName.japanese: 今日の勝負は、学院派の再度敗北
displayName.schinese: 今日的胜负，是学院派的再度败北

description.english: Witnessing Patchouli obtaining useless information through footprint analysis.
description.japanese: パチュリーが足跡分析法で無駄な情報を得るのを目撃する。
description.schinese: 见证帕秋莉通过足迹分析之法获得了无用的信息

displayName.english: It's Marisa, not Sir Liu
displayName.japanese: 魔理沙だ、劉青春じゃない

description.english: Completing the reasoning through the connection.
description.japanese: コネクトする方法で推理を完成させる。
description.schinese: 通过连线的方式完成推理

displayName.english: Do you legal professionals all have a penchant for long and complex sentences?
displayName.japanese: 法律関係の皆さんは、長い複雑な文章がそんなに好きなんですか？
displayName.schinese: 你们搞法律的，都这么喜欢长难句？

description.english: Hearing the interpretation of the crime of endangering public safety from Yakumo Yukari.
description.japanese: 八雲紫から公衆の安全を害する罪の説明を聞く
description.schinese: 从八云紫口中听到危害公共安全罪的释义

displayName.english: Star Burst Stream
displayName.japanese: 必殺技：スター・バースト・ストリーム

description.english: Listening to Yakumo Yukari talking about the weapon of Konpaku Youmu.
description.japanese: 八雲紫が魂魄妖夢の武器について語るのを聞く
description.schinese: 听八云紫讲述魂魄妖梦的武器

displayName.english: Steamed lamb, steamed bear's paw, steamed deer tail, roasted duck, roasted chicken, roasted gosling...
displayName.japanese: 蒸し羊、蒸しクマの掌、蒸しシカの尾、焼ケの鸭、焼鶏、焼ガモ…
displayName.schinese: 蒸羊羔、蒸熊掌、蒸鹿尾儿、烧花鸭、烧雏鸡、烧子鹅……

description.english: Learn about Saigyouji Yuyuko's eating habit.
description.japanese: 西行寺幽々子の食習慣を理解する？
description.schinese: 了解西行寺幽幽子的饮食习惯？

displayName.english: I love you, you love, me. The Netherworld Milk and Tea
displayName.japanese: 愛される、愛してる。冥界氷城甘い
displayName.schinese: 你爱我，我爱你，冥界冰城甜蜜蜜

description.english: Proposing to make tea with the socks of Youmu.
description.japanese: 魂魄妖夢の靴下で紅茶を淹れることを提案する。
description.schinese: 提议用魂魄妖梦的袜子泡茶喝

displayName.english: Saying good night in Hakugyokurou
displayName.japanese: 白玉楼でおやすみ

description.english: Understanding the bedtime of Youmu.
description.japanese: 魂魄妖夢の就寝時間を理解する。
description.schinese: 了解魂魄妖梦的就寝时间

displayName.english: I say, Miss Patchouli has a high opinion
displayName.japanese: パチュリー様、ご高見です

description.english: Listening to Patchouli's analysis of the current situation.
description.japanese: パチュリーが現在の状況を分析するのを聞く。
description.schinese: 听帕秋莉分析现在的局势

displayName.english: Endless testimony
displayName.japanese: 终わらない証言

description.english: Finding a testimony that contradicts the facts in a level composed of more than 15 testimonies.
description.japanese: 15回以上の証言からなるステージで、事実と反する証言を見つける。
description.schinese: 在超过15句证言构成的关卡中，找到与事实相悖的证言

displayName.english: Life Group is like this
displayName.japanese: 生活団はこうなんです

description.english: Grab a quick meal during the court recess.
description.japanese: 裁判の合間に急いで食事を摂ります。
description.schinese: 在庭审间隙抓紧时间干饭

displayName.english: Clean and hygienic
displayName.japanese: 清潔で衛生的

description.english: Bravely jump into the Sanzu River for a bath during the court recess.
description.japanese: 裁判の合間に勇敢にも三途の川に飛び込みながらお風呂に入ります。
description.schinese: 在庭审间隙勇敢地跳进三途川洗澡

displayName.english: Prohibited activities
displayName.japanese: 禁止事項

description.english: Trying to take this game off the shelf during the court recess.
description.japanese: 裁判の合間にこのゲームを下架する試みです。
description.schinese: 在庭审间隙尝试将本游戏下架

displayName.english: The second stage!
displayName.japanese: 第二階段！

description.english: Forced to fight the second half of the trial in the court.
description.japanese: 裁判で後半戦に臨むことになれる。
description.schinese: 在庭审上被迫应战下半场的审判

displayName.english: discover the minutest detail in everything
displayName.japanese: 秋毫を明察する

description.english: Finding the key evidence through memory.
description.japanese: 思い出して重要な証拠を見つける。
description.schinese: 通过回忆找到关键的证物

displayName.english: Continuous questioning is the romance of this kind of game
displayName.japanese: 連続的な追及は、このゲームのロマン
displayName.schinese: 连续的追问是这类游戏的浪漫

description.english: Digging out the truth of the evidence in the memory.
description.japanese: 思い出の中の証拠の真実を掘り起こす。
description.schinese: 挖掘出回忆中证物的真相

displayName.english: For you, the master of reasoning
displayName.japanese: 推理の達人に捧げる

description.english: Activating the bonus level.
description.japanese: ボーナスステージをアクティベートする。
description.schinese: 激活奖励关卡

displayName.english: There is a corpse buried under the cherry tree
displayName.japanese: 西行妖の足下には死体が埋まっている
displayName.schinese: 樱花树的脚下埋藏着尸体

description.english: Finding the object buried under the Saigyo Ayakashi.
description.japanese: 西行妖の下に埋まっている物体を見つける。
description.schinese: 找到西行妖下埋藏的物体

displayName.english: My immortal cannot be so dark
displayName.japanese: 俺の仙人がこんなに腹黒いわけじゃない
displayName.schinese: 我的仙人不可能这么腹黑

description.english: Hearing Kaku Seiga's acquittal declaration.
description.japanese: 霍青娥の無罪判決宣言を聞く。
description.schinese: 听到霍青娥的脱罪宣言

displayName.english: So, what is the price?
displayName.japanese: では、代償は？

description.english: Listening to Yakumo Yukari talking about the spirit of the law.
description.japanese: 八雲紫が法律の精神について語るのを聞く。
description.schinese: 听到八云紫讲述法律的精神

displayName.english: In the name of the people
displayName.japanese: 人民の名において

description.english: Judging Yakumo Yukari in court.
description.japanese: 裁判で八雲紫を審判する。
description.schinese: 在庭审上审判八云紫

displayName.english: Don't recycle the foreshadowing at this time!
displayName.japanese: こんな時に伏線を回収しないでくださいよ！
displayName.schinese: 不要在这种时候回收伏笔啊喂！

description.english: Recycling the foreshadowing at the beginning of the game at the end of the game.
description.japanese: ゲームの最後で最初の伏線を取り戻す。
description.schinese: 在游戏最后回收游戏最初的伏笔

displayName.english: The disappearance of the great lawyer Marisa.
displayName.japanese: 大弁護士魔理沙の消失

description.english: Watching the ending plot.
description.japanese: エンディングのドラマを観る。
description.schinese: 观看尾声剧情

displayName.english: If I must adds a limit, I wish it could be 10000 years.
displayName.japanese: もし期限を設定しなければならないなら、私は一万年を望む
displayName.schinese: 如果必须加上一个期限，我希望是一万年

description.english: Watching the final judgment.
description.japanese: 最後の判決を観る。
description.schinese: 观看最后的判罚
